job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
   Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
   Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
   Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications with and on behalf of customers
   Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
   Write application specifications and documentation
   Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
   Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software
job_details.full_text:
Solution Engineer

Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
   Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
   Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
   Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications with and on behalf of customers
   Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
   Write application specifications and documentation
   Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
   Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing and deploying applications on a specific platform (C3 AI Platform) and involves customer-facing activities like training and support. While it mentions 'AI-based enterprise applications', it lacks specific details about generative models, LLMs, or core ML model development that would align it with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. The emphasis is more on application development, customer interaction, and platform utilization rather than core AI/ML research or engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications' directly relates to building and deploying software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Write application specifications and documentation' is a standard software development activity.
The phrase 'Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications' involves the lifecycle of software development and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies' relates to proactive management and maintenance of systems, which is part of operations.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements' indicates a need to understand product goals and contribute to strategic improvements.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques' involves teaching and guiding others, a key communication and collaboration skill.
job_tasks.phrase: Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications' requires communication and collaboration to provide feedback and ensure quality.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training' clearly involves communication and presenting technical information to customers.
job_tasks.phrase: Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
